1.0.name: wordpress/p2p-slides
1.0.description:
Note: This plugin requires Posts 2 Posts

Allows you to associate a custom post type ("slides") with any of your other post types (defaults to "pages"). This is useful for theme developers of those that want to add custom sliders around your theme.

This plugin does not provide you out of the box front end functionality. If you're looking for a drop in and play slider, this isn't it.
